name: Unfair Mario: 3d-Remake
description:
This is a 3d-Remake of the legendary retro parody (HARDCORE) game: UNFAIR MARIO. I think the game is a must-played game. Everyone should have tried Unfair Mario! 

The game is still in Development. The version 0.6.1 is just a demo of the first level. Planned are 10-15 Levels, based on the original Unfair Mario. The first Level will be nearly the same as the original first level. 

I would appreciate ideas and feedback in the comments!

If you're interested to participate in this project, feel free to contact me (for example via twitter: @YousefWowhab)

Have fun!
